title: 20 Min LeaverBuster
body:
I started Ranked game . When I joined the map my PC turned OFF for no reason , I immediately turned it ON. When my PC turned ON I opened game and saw game is over because they voted to surrend while it is 4v5. Even ti all happend in max 4 min and it was only time I got LeaverBuster of 20min! Can i somehow get rid of it?

Greetings ! 

Thanks .

replies.body: A PC shutting down can be a pretty critical issue that should be looked into right away!  Unless you kicked the power cord off, a pc will shut off due to safety precautions and faulty hardware.  A [leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty would only occur after multiple leaves and not just 1 game.  It would also apply regardless of intent because it still causes others a negative experience.  Hopefully, that helps clear things up but let me know if you need help with your shutting down issue!
I think I've found Power issue where is main cabel to plug in PC it's bit broken so yeah I'll fix it as far as possible Thanks!
